biotools.summary:
Improved cell composition deconvolution method of bulk gene expression profiles to quantify subsets of immune cells.

Estimate the fractions of immune cells from expression profiles of tissues.

This method is created as described in the manuscript - "Deconvolution of bulk gene expression profiles from complex tissues to quantify subsets of immune cells".

The tool is designed to estimate the fractions of immune cells from the expression profiles of tissues, such as tumor masses, PBMCs, etc.

bioschemas.name: deconvolution estimate immune cell subsets
